abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column highlights circumstances of financial planner Brian Thompson and his husband Benjamin Rogers in assessing degree to which legalized same-sex marriage will have financial implications; notes that if Supreme Court strikes down bans on gay marriage issued by states, many gay couples will find themselves tackling financial questions they have not thought about.
lead_paragraph: Couples have had to navigate byzantine laws as same-sex marriage rights have progressed state by state. A Supreme Court ruling may change everything.
snippet: Couples have had to navigate byzantine laws as same-sex marriage rights have progressed state by state. A Supreme Court ruling may change everything.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: A Gay Couple Awaits the Justices’ Decision
headline.print_headline: A Gay Couple Awaits the Justices’ Decision
